Class And

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.subordinate.AbstractCondition
      • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.subordinate.And
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Condition, Serializable

    public class And
extends AbstractCondition
    A logical AND of two or more conditions.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Martin Shevchenko, Jonathan Austin
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        protected boolean execute()
        Evaluates the condition. Note that this uses the short-circuit and operator, so condition 'b' will not necessarily be evaluated.
        Specified by:
        execute in class AbstractCondition
        Returns:
        true if all conditions are true, otherwise false

      • execute

        protected boolean execute(Request request)
        Evaluates the condition using values on the Request. Note that this uses the short-circuit and operator, so condition 'b' will not necessarily be evaluated.
        Specified by:
        execute in class AbstractCondition
        Parameters:
        request - the request being processed.
        Returns:
        true if all conditions are true, otherwise false

      • getConditions

        public List<Condition> getConditions()
        Returns:
        the conditions which will be combined with a logical AND.
